Method Detail

getIpAddress

public byte[] getIpAddress()
Returns the endpoint address resulting from the ProxyRequest.getEndpointAddress(). If not set, it will return the SocksProxyConstants.FAKE_IP constant value which will be ignored in a SOCKS v4 request.

Returns:
the endpoint address

getPort

public byte[] getPort()
Return the server port as a byte array.

the server port
